page.title: 05COMMUTER FAMILY, LIMPSFIELD
page.content: A lady in her 30's and has lived in {Limpsfield}for six months. She has two girls aged 7 and 13. Her husband commutes to{Kingswood,}a twenty minute journey. Previously they lived in{ {Wiltshire}for seven years. They chose{ {Limpsfield}because of the{M25}link. They found their housing estate highly priced and most of the inhabitants are commuting families. Social life includes{Church, School} and{sporting activities.}The children have joined clubs and the husbands meet through their wives' contacts. She uses{Limpsfield Bakers}and the{ {Wine Shop,}occasionally the{Memorial {Stores}but{Caterham}for the weekly shopping and{Croydon}for everything else. The elder girl goes to{Oxted County {School}and the younger to{Limpsfield {Primary School. }
